Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Hey SK8TR BOIS: please try to keep your ski tips out of the classic tracks on Bucks Run. Instead, use that destructive energy to knock down the little berm the groomer leaves for you on the skate deck - thanksClassic skiers: the man made snow is fast and there is good grip with fish scales going up the “hill” - enjoy!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a comfortable day with the temperature to stay above freezing. The snow continues to be in good condition with excellent grooming. All of our terrain is open with the exception of the glades. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is tomato. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
